Title: Madras Cafe
Writer: Shubhendu Bhattacharya (story and screenplay), Juhi Chaturvedi (dialogue), Somnath Dey (story and screenplay), Dusan Tolmac (additional screenplay)
Actors: John Abraham, Nargis Fakhri, Raashi Khanna, Prakash Belawadi
Plot: An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.
